DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study compare efficacy safety ABP 501 adalimumab ( HUMIRA® ) adult plaque psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Efficacy Safety ABP 501 Adalimumab ( HUMIRA® ) Adults With Moderate Severe Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Men woman ≥ 18 ≤ 75 year age time screen 2 . Stable moderate severe plaque psoriasis least 6 month baseline 3 . Moderate severe psoriasis define screen baseline : Body surface area ( BSA ) affect plaque psoriasis 10 % great , PASI score 12 great , static physician 's global assessment score 3 great 4 . No known history active tuberculosis 5 . Subject candidate systemic therapy phototherapy procedures 6 . Previous failure , inadequate response , intolerance , contraindication least 1 conventional antipsoriatic systemic therapy 1 . Forms psoriasis skin condition time screen visit ( eg , eczema ) 2 . Ongoing use prohibit treatment 3 . Prior use 2 biologics treatment psoriasis 4 . Previous receipt adalimumab biosimilar adalimumab Other Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply
